explanation: [0-0] A woman is lying on her side in bed, covered with a blue blanket. There is a blue mobile phone on the blanket. She rests her head on a beige pillow. The bed is white, and next to it is a pink bucket filled with water. The floor is gray, and a green plant sits beside the headboard. A yellow hook is attached to the headboard. The walls are white.

[0-3] The woman turns over, and the blue mobile phone falls into the bucket. She quickly sits up and looks at the bucket. She is wearing a black top. She takes the phone out of the bucket and puts it on the hook on the headboard.

[0-3] The woman turns over, and the blue mobile phone falls into the bucket. She quickly sits up and looks at the bucket. She is wearing a black top. She takes the phone out of the bucket and puts it on the hook on the headboard.

[3-7] The scene then switches to a white cabinet with yellow, blue, green, and pink hooks on it. A pot of flowers and some books are placed beside them. The woman picks up a yellow hook, peels off the sticker underneath, and sticks it to the headboard. Then, she takes out a mobile phone with a green phone case, plugs it in to charge, and hangs it on the hook.
